item.title: Analyzing Inpatient Data From the Hospital Charge Data Set
item.description: About the dataset The dataset is openly available. It shows the provider summary for the top 100 Diagnosis-Related Groups (DRG) for the year 2011 library(tidyverse) inpatient <- read_csv('~/Downloads/inpatient.csv') inpatient %>% dim ## [1] 163065 12 Let me show you one row of the dataset (it has been split into two lines) DRG Definition Provider Id Provider Name Provider Street Address Provider City Provider State Provider Zip Code Hospital Referral Region Descri 039 -EXTRACRANIAL PROCEDURES W/O CC OR MCC 10001 SOUTHEAST ALABAMA MEDICAL CENTER 1108 ROSS CLARK CIR DOTHAN AL 36301 AL - Dothan Total Discharges Average Covered Charges Average Total Payments Average Medicare Payments 91 $32963.
